post.author: 나수환
post.content:
SAP 환경에서 자바개발자는 상당히 이점이 있을거라는 이야기를 들었답니다.
관심있는분 연락바랍니다.
위치는 워털룰 입니다.
http://www.mks.com

alexna2003@yahoo.com


Here’s what we need:
2+ years Java programming
Web development including HTML, JSP, Javascript
Demonstrated problem solving skills

Nice to Have:
Development experience in Java, C/C++, ideally in an enterprise setting

Experience with web app development including HTML, Javascript, XML, JSP

Knowledge or experience with various development methodologies like Agile, XP and Waterfall

Experience in different roles, some or all of the following:Designer, Developer, Project Management, Team Lead, Process Analyst, QA

Experience with packaged applications like SAP, JDE, Siebel

Experience with regulatory or process demands of things like Sarbanes Oxley, FDA, CMM is ideal
post.title: Solutions Developer
